posts.author: Diari de Girona
posts.title: La Fundació Endesa convoca els segons premis a l'Ecoinnovació educativa
posts.text:
La Fundació Endesa convoca els segons premis a l'Ecoinnovació educativa ddg 07.11.2017 | 07:10 
La Fundació Endesa ha posat en marxa la segona edició dels premis a l'Ecoinnovació Educativa, oberts a l'alumnat de Secundària, Batxillerat i Formació Professional de grau mitjà. La convocatòria estarà oberta fins al 15 de desembre. 
L'objectiu és motivar i potenciar les pràctiques innovadores en matèria d'energia, medi ambient i cura i preservació de l'entorn en els projectes educatius de centre. Per això, se seleccionen i s'impulsen projectes escolars d'educació ambiental que reflecteixen el compromís de professors, centres i estudiants. En l'última edició es van presentar 143 projectes de tot l'Estat i, dels 15 finalistes, el jurat en va reconèixer 7. 
Els guardons tenen tres categories, titulades «Quèés per a tu la natura?»; «La meva solució creativa a un problema mediambiental»; i «Com milloraries el teu entorn». Un cop fetes les inscripcions, les candidatures tindran fins al 15 d'abril de 2018 i presentar telemàticament els projectes al web ecoinnovacion.fundacionendesa.org. Per a les dues primeres modalitats, els premis estan dotats amb 2.000 euros i per a la tercera, en 4.000. Compartir a Twitter

posts.author: Τμήμα ειδήσεων (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Πέθανε πασίγνωστος Έλληνας επιχειρηματίας!
posts.text:
Έφυγε χθες από τη ζωή σε ηλικία 86 ετών στην Αθήνα ο επιχειρηματίας και πρώην πρόεδρος του ΣΕΒΕ και των εταιρειών ΔΕΘ και Helexpo Βασίλης Κουρτέσης. Είχε γεννηθεί το 1931 και είχε καταγωγή από την Κέρκυρα. δ ΕΙΤΕ ΕΠΙΣΗΣ:  Προσέξτε: Ανατροπή στα διπλώματα οδήγησης – Τι αλλάζει Δραστηριοποιήθηκε στο χώρο των δομικών υλικών-κατασκευών με την εταιρεία παραγωγής ασφαλτικών προϊόντων Βιτουμίνα και την κατασκευαστική Ακτίς. Κατά τη διάρκεια της προεδρίας του στον Σύνδεσμο Εξαγωγέων Βορείου Ελλάδος την περίοδο 1990-1994 προσέδωσε ευρωπαϊκή διάσταση στη λειτουργία του Συνδέσμου μέσα και από τις εκθεσιακές συναντήσεις Europartenariat. 


ΔΕΙΤΕ ΕΠΙΣΗΣ:  Στεγνώνετε τα ρούχα μέσα στο σπίτι; Δείτε από τι κινδυνεύετε  

Το 1993-1996 ήταν πρόεδρος της ΔΕΘ, στη συνέχεια διετέλεσε για μικρό χρονικό διάστημα(Ιανουάριος 1996-Μάρτιος 1997) Γενικός Γραμματέας του ΕΟΤ και μετά τη διάσπαση του εθνικού εκθεσιακού φορέα ανέλαβε πρόεδρος της Helexpο το διάστημα 1999-2001. Παράλληλα το 2001-2003 ήταν πρόεδρος και στις δυο εταιρείες ΔΕΘ και Helexpo. Δική του πρόταση ήταν η δημιουργία ενός φορέα διαχείρισης ευρωπαϊκών προγραμμάτων και πρωτοστάτησε σε συνεργασία με τον ΣΒΒΕ για τη δημιουργία του ΚΕΠΑ το 2002. Επιπλέον πέτυχε και δημιουργήθηκε κατ΄εξαίρεση στη Θεσσαλονίκη το Γραφείο Ενημέρωσης του Ευρωπαίου Πολίτη. 

ΔΕΙΤΕ ΕΠΙΣΗΣ:  Έκοψαν το ρεύμα σε άνεργη πολύτεκνη μητέρα! Συγκλονίζει η κραυγή απόγνωσης

ΔΕΙΤΕ ΕΠΙΣΗΣ:  Αυτοκίνητο παρέσυρε 13χρονη 

ΔΕΙΤΕ ΕΠΙΣΗΣ:  Σοκάρει η αληθινή εξομολόγηση του 24χρονου Θοδωρή: «Πήγα με ιερόδουλη και ήταν η…»

thread.title: Tekebayev's attorney claims unknown intruders stole copies of documents in his home
thread.title_full: Tekebayev's attorney claims unknown intruders stole copies of documents in his home

posts.title: Tekebayev's attorney claims unknown intruders stole copies of documents in his home
posts.text:
Tekebayev's attorney claims unknown intruders stole copies of documents in his home Kyrgyzstan | incidents | 12:44, 07 November 2017 | 178 
AKIPRESS.COM - Attorney Kanat Khasanov, who is defending the interests of former leader of Ata-Meken opposition party Omurbek Tekebayev, said the unknown intruders broke into his house and stole copies of documents. 
Bishkek police said it has received a complaint from Khasanov, who said that on the night of November 7 the intruders broke into his house through the window, stole copies of certain documents. 
Police said they are looking into the report. 
Khasanov wrote in his Facebook posting that "thieves broke into his house from the first floor window" and his wife woke up at the noise and started screaming. 
"They jumped out of the window. Interestingly, the light of the first floor was turned on and the height of the first floor window was quite high, it is surprising how fearlessness those people are. I'm afraid to imagine what would happen if my wife did not wake up and scream," he said.

thread.title: Mistletoe and Palm Trees Release Blitz
thread.title_full: Mistletoe and Palm Trees Release Blitz

posts.author: Erzabet Bishop (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Mistletoe and Palm Trees Release Blitz
posts.text:
Title: Sun, Sand & Sea – Mistletoe Palm Trees Genre: Romantic Suspense Publisher: Rolling Thunder Publishing Hosted by: Lady Amber’s PR Blurb: Stories of Sun, Sand and Sea - Mistletoe & Palm Trees. "Makes for ten holiday celebrations like none other. Sunny skies. Check. Palm Trees. Check. Beaches. Maybe. Family. Sometimes. Love and Romance. Double Check. Scrumptious food and a few cocktails. Triple Check. Murder. At least one. Ten novellas written with heart felt holiday spirit that will make you laugh, bring tears to your eyes, warmth to your soul, intrigue to your psyche, with just enough romance to make you wish for more. Celebrate with us!"  The ten authors of Indie Publishing Coalition. Judith Lucci:  Biloxi Beach Murders (Book 2) Tag Line - The Gulf Coast Can be Deadly Kat, who finishes her graduate degree in Art History in December, travels from Washington, DC where she is interning at the Smithsonian Museum to Biloxi for some Thanksgiving holiday fun with her friends. Everyone is there including - her former main squeeze Liam. A great time turns sour when one of her old friends from the University of New Orleans is found beaten and bruised, floating in a fishing boat in the Gulf of Mexico. Lilian Robert:   Waves of Passion Lindsey is a stunning young woman full of life, smart, efficient and ambitious, she surrounds herself with quality friends and has gained the respect of coworkers, superiors, and friends.  Her heartbreaking separation from a five-year relationship left a void that someday would need to be filled. But at this point, romance seemed like unsafe territory. And just about the time she thought she had achieved an impenetrable, relationship-proof fortress, Paul, a virtual friend on Facebook, sweeps he thoughts away and sets her nights on fire. If he is anything like what she had built in her mind, he would be a force to be reckoned. Lindsey is just about to find out. PJ Fiala:   Copper Moon – Colby Aubree Norman has run Norman House Inn since she was twenty years old. Boyfriends have come and gone, not understanding her need to keep her grandparents home viable and running. Settling in to grow old in the beautiful Victorian and make her bed & breakfast the place to be, she killing it. When fire jumper, Colby Landon comes to town he brings excitement with him. First, the hotel burns down other fires soon follow. As the flame burns hot between Aubree and Colby, will their love have a chance to grow or will the arsonist's torch turn their newfound flame into smoldering embers? Cherime MacFarlane:   Wild in Willow The Larkin family plans to celebrate Christmas a little early due to a commitment made by the oldest son. But things are brewing in the background that may make it Wild in Willow. Irene Maddox is accompanying her friend Libby to the celebration. Can the family survive the blow up? Only time will tell. Nicole Sorrell:  The Art of Getting Away Carlos is head over heels for his sassy girl Andie, and he wants their first Christmas together to be extra special. A romantic escape to the lake cabin where they met will be perfect. But Andie's ex-boyfriend interrupts his plans, begging her to give him a second chance. Carlos suspects the former gang member isn't telling Andie the truth, and decides he's going to do whatever it takes to keep her. And if that means fighting dirty... Angel Sefer:  Deadly Paradise When Angelos Dimitriou a devastatingly handsome prominent attorney from Athens finds Natasha Ioannou unconscious on the steep rocks of a remote beach on Naxos, he is caught in a web of conspiracy, extortion, and greed. But the feisty and brave young woman with the emerald eyes captivates his soul, and Angelos throws caution to the wind in order to protect her. Caught in the eye of the storm, Natasha finds it hard to trust anyone. Will she ever open up to Angelos? And will he be able to save the blonde beauty from the threat hovering over her? Sybil Shae:  One More Day: Surviving the Waves After the hurricane Chloe's life was in shambles, much like the buildings and the land around her, everything was destroyed. Her home, her family and her love all torn apart by a single wave. There was nothing left for her at Luna Beach. She moved away and spent years struggling to put her life back together. Just when she is starting to feel a small sense of normalcy, a Christmas Card arrives in the mail. What it says sets her emotions and her sanity into a whirlwind. P.J. MacLayne:  Love on the Dunes Sunny skies, sandy beaches, palm trees and swimsuits. It wasn't like any Christmas Carena Galloway had ever known. She missed her family and worried about her relationship with her boyfriend, Aiden Wade. A picnic on the beach with friends was just the thing to distract her from her problems. Meeting a celebrity was a bonus. But she never counted on attracting a stalker. Stephany Tullis:  Baby Boomer Bash TAG LINE: Baby Boomers ONLY! No family allowed. High school friends Sherry Mattison and Maddy Meriweather refuse to allow their adult children to ruin their love of Christmas and the family based traditions that are so near and dear to their hearts. Unlike Ebenezer Scrooge and the Grinch, they don't decide to cancel this year's Christmas, nor do their hearts harden. Instead of presenting their annual plea for an extended family Christmas like those of the good old days, the baby boomers greet their families on Thanksgiving Day with a new attitude and a feisty festive spirit that includes a non-traditional Thanksgiving dinner: pot luck! Their daughters are shocked but pleased when Christmas plans are not discussed as the family watches the Thanksgiving Day parade. Everyone is relieved that football half time focuses on another round of desserts and no mention of drawing names for the family Christmas gift exchange. Sherry and Maddy kick off their plans for their Baby Boomer Christmas celebration with a Black Friday shopping spree. And then the thirty-day count-down begins! Will the boomers' plans implode when someone blows the whistle on their European beach vacation? Valerie J. Clarizio:  Jess & Sam’s Story After twenty years, Jess returns home to care for her ailing mother. Close proximity to the man she once loved who'd dumped her on the very day she expected a marriage proposal reawakens her broken heart and strengthens her vow to never put faith in a man. By his own choice, Sam's the most elusive bachelor in town, his walls of defense firmly in place. But when the feisty little brunette he dated in high school and college moves back, Sam needs to step up his game, stiffening those walls to concrete. True love? A forever union? What kind of idiot believes in that? No matter which way Sam and Jess turn in their little home town, they run into each other. And stumbling under the mistletoe isn't what either one needs. Buy Link:  Amazon:  http://amzn.to/2AokutQ Universal Link:   https://www.books2read.com/u/mvjoKe Barnes & Noble:  http://www.pjfiala.com/Books/MPT-B&N iBooks:   https://itunes.apple.com/us/book/stories-of-sun-sand-sea-mistletoe-and-palm-trees/id1291792356?mt=11&ign-mpt=uo%3D4 Kobo:   https://www.kobo.com/us/en/ebook/stories-of-sun-sand-sea-mistletoe-and-palm-trees    Judith Lucci: Judith Lucci writes what she knows Hospitals, Patients, Physicians and Health Care. She adds suspense and intrigue along with well developed plots, vivid descriptions and memorable characters, and produces medical thrillers that few readers can put down. Dr. Lucci is the author of the Alexandra Destephano Series, a series of medical thrillers that offer fans an escape into the busy world of a fictitious world-class hospital in New Orleans. Author web links: Website: https://www.judithlucci.com/ Facebook: https://www.judithlucci.com/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/JudithLucci Google +: https://plus.google.com/115815025459107638261 Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/rocchijt/author-judith-lucci/ Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/Judith-Lucci/e/B00AUVN0GK/ref=sr_tc_2_0?qid=1507033801&sr=1-2-ent Lilian Roberts: Lilian Roberts is a corporate engineer. College, and the corporate world kept Lilian's writing on the back burner for a few years. It wasn't until later on in life that she decided to sit in front of the computer and finally put her thoughts on paper. She lives in Atlanta, Georgia. She is an avid reader and loves novels that feature characters draped in passion, mystery, and adventure. She is especially fascinated with the concept of immortality. Lilian is the author of the Immortal Rapture series, eight paranormal, captivating, romance novels. A young British girl Arielle Lloyd with special gifts and an immortal man Sebastian Gaulle find their way to each other and want nothing more than to pledge their undying love to the world. For five centuries Sebastian has sought the one soul who can fulfill his dreams of everlasting love. Then he meets Arielle, whose heart calls out to him like no other. Once I found the courage to write, life changed for me in the most profound way. Bringing stories to readers that I'd enjoy reading and creating characters that are flawed, but lovable is such a joy. When not writing, I'm with my family doing something fun.  My husband, Gene, and I are bikers and enjoy riding to new locations, meeting new people and generally enjoying this fabulous country we live in. I come from a family of veterans. My grandfather, father, brother, two sons, and one daughter-in-law are all veterans. Needless to say, I am proud to be an American and proud of the service my amazing family has given. A prolific multi-genre author, she has a broad range of interests that reflect her been there-done that life. Romance, Historical Fiction, Fantasy, Paranormal, all sorts of characters and plots evolve from a vivid imagination. I came to Alaska kicking and screaming in 1975, and I never want to leave. I cut firewood on shares for money to get through the winter. I swore I would not live above the Alaska Range because it was too cold there and wound up in the Copper River Basin where it got just a cold as Fairbanks. My second husband, a Scot from Glasgow, was the love of my life. When I write Scots dialect, I experienced hearing it from my in-laws. Each time my husband got on the phone to Scotland after five seconds, I could hardly understand a word. I was my second husband's chief mechanic's helper and roadie. I live in a cabin which is slowly being surrounded by the city and wish I were further out. My two cats and Husky-Collie mix dog are happy in our little slice of heaven called Alaska. In the silence of winter dreams of people and places provide a rich pool of ideas to explore. It's a romance story, has suspense and surprise, and with book two, became a women's fiction series.     I'm still a voracious reader, currently residing in a rural area of the mid-west. After living in various parts of the U.S. and traveling abroad, I recently moved into the very same home where I grew up. I enjoy country living: ours is a small community, and everyone knows everybody. The culture of the city also draws me in: the shopping, dining, and the opera and ballet. I love traveling, especially to other countries, and I speak Spanish. I earned a Bachelor of Arts in Hispanic Literature, and a Bachelor of Science in Fashion Merchandising. Home decorating is one of my favorite things. Of course I love to read, and I'm a published poet. I like baking pies and drinking ale. Keeping up with all the men in her life has turned her into an outdoors enthusiast, of which her favorite activity is hiking in national parks. While out on the trails, she has plenty of time to conjure up irresistible characters and unique storylines for her next romantic suspense or sweet contemporary romance novel. thread.title: 宋阳峰：比特币VS黄金，黄金还是略胜一筹_现货沥青白银黄金_城市公众论坛
thread.title_full: 宋阳峰：比特币VS黄金，黄金还是略胜一筹_现货沥青白银黄金_城市公众论坛

posts.author: 宋阳峰 发表于
posts.title: 宋阳峰：比特币VS黄金，黄金还是略胜一筹_现货沥青白银黄金_城市公众论坛
posts.text:
宋阳峰：比特币VS黄金，黄金还是略胜一筹
最近炒的火热的比特币价格在一个月内翻了一倍，黄金的价格却比较平稳，火特币作为一种虚拟的货币在市场上难道比黄金更受追捧吗?到底哪种投资更值得我们去选择呢?
黄金VS比特币
比特币高波动性
如果按照美元来计算，比特币比英镑的波动性高出11倍，比石油的波动性高出3倍。任何波动性高的产品都不适合作为可靠的支付手段或者保值手段，比特币的风险性也比传统的保值商品黄金高。
比特币的监管问题
任何真正成为大众化和涉及金钱的东西最终都会吸引政府监管机构的兴趣。因此，随着比特币获得更多用户，许多人会通过像比特币这样的加密货币转移非法财产。到时候，中美这些主要国家将严厉打击比特币的使用，或者废除它的交易。
比特币可感知的安全风险
香港交易所的比特币失窃案证明了这一点。任何通过互联网进行连接的东西都有可能遭受到网络攻击。即便黑客只是盗窃用户账户、而不是破解了区块链，但民众们不会管这一点，他们只知道他们的财产是不安全的，随时可能被黑客盯上。
如果比特币想成为Visa、运通、银联这样的主要金融交易载体，或者替代黄金成为数字时代的金融避风港，那么它必须在投资者和用户间建立行之有效的信任机制。这样的机制建立至少要花费数十年的时间。即便是信用卡也没有在一夜之间得到广泛接受。
黄金的自身的优势
数千年来，人类对黄金的信任有着悠久的历史，黄金都被用作等价交换物和保值工具。黄金是有形的，黄金它也是恒久保值的，你可以握在手里，揣在怀中，黄金不能被摧毁，即便熔成金汤，它的价值也不会改变。
黄金的供应量相对有限，即便每年都会新增一些产量，但不像纸币那样可以无成本、无限量的增发。
黄金是能抗通货膨胀
最近几十年，通货膨胀十分严重，普遍国家都受此问题的困扰。货币价值贬值，货币的购买力日渐降低，钱变得不值钱了。在一些极端的情况，国家的货币通货膨胀严重，钞票就会变得如同废纸一般。黄金本身属于贵重商品，金价会随着通货膨胀而上升，也就是黄金抵消了通货膨胀的损失，保证了投资者的资产不会被通货膨胀侵蚀。
黄金卓越的避险功能
当世界政局和经济不稳，尤其是发生战争或经济危机时，各种普遍的投资工具如股票、基金、房地产等都会受到严重的冲击，这时黄金就体现了很好的避险属性。即使遭遇经济危机，黄金的价格仍能维持不变甚至稳步上升，保持了资产的价值。而随着黄金矿藏的不断开采和需求的不断增加，黄金变得更加稀有，增强了自身的避险属性。
黄金投资市场难以被操控
地区性的股票市场，人为操纵大市的情况比比皆是。但是黄金市场属于全球性市场，没有任何个人或财团有足够的资金能够操控全球黄金市场，因此黄金价格能够一直保持在反映实际供求关系的水平。黄金的价格全球统一，没有交易商的报价敢偏离实际范围，因为一旦报出偏离的价格，全球就会有大量的投资者进行无风险套利。由于黄金市场无法被人为操纵，投资者在价格公平度方面就得到了最大的保障。
黄金与比特币相比还是略胜一筹，黄金它是实物它的风险相对就会低一点，比特币是虚拟货币，相对它的风险就会高一点。但是是投资就会有风险，宋阳峰在这里提醒大家还是要小心谨慎。
借一些话至投资朋友:泥泞路上的奔驰,永远跑不过高速路上的夏利,平台很重要。男人再优秀,没有女人也生不下孩子,说明合作很重要。熊嫁给狗,只会变成狗熊,但若嫁给猫,却会成为熊猫,才能享受尊贵。选择大于努力,选择不对努力白废。今天的结果是昨天抉择所导致的,那么未来投资的盈亏将取决于今天的决定!
宋阳峰老师每日在线指导QQ:980,430,716威-信：syf884
作者赠言：投资不要盲目，需要理智的选择，也需要有人指引，如果你迷茫。建议你找一个专业的老师指引你走的更远，站的更高！未来不迎，过往不恋！

thread.title: Медицинский центр \
thread.title_full: Медицинский центр \

posts.author: Moderator
posts.title: Медицинский центр \
posts.text:
Медицинский центр «Геном» была открыт после реконструкции в 2014 году. Сегодня это престижный медицинский центр, расположенный в современном двухэтажном здании на площади свыше 1200 кв м.
Основные направления деятельности - лечение бесплодия, гинекология, урология-андрология, терапия, маммология, аллергология, косметология и пластическая хирургия.
Высокая результативность лечения обеспечена современным оснащением, уровнем квалификации специалистов, передовыми технологиями.
Перечень услуг клиники включает:
ВРТ (вспомогательные репродуктивные технологии):
- экстракорпоральное оплодотворение (ЭКО и ИКСИ)
- внутриматочная инсеминация
- гормональная стимуляция
- криоконсервация эмбрионов, ооцитов, спермы
- перенос эмбрионов в матку в свежем виде и криоциклах ЭКО
- вспомогательный хэтчинг
- биоспия яичка/придатка (извлечение сперматозоидов из яичка или придатков при отсутствии их в семенной жидкости)
- донация гамет и эмбрионов
- программы суррогатного материнства
Хирургические методы
- гистероскопия (гистерорезектоскопия)
- гинекологическая лапароскопия
- микрохирургическая операция по Мармару (лечение варикоцеле)
- реконструктивные операции по восстановлению проходимости семявыводящих путей
- малые урологические операции (циркумцизио, удаление новообразований и др.)
- полостные и реконструктивно-пластические гинекологические операции (гименопластика, фиксация матки при опущении/выпадении, возвращение дородовых форм и пр.)
Диагностические методы:
- УЗИ на экспертном оборудовании
- кольпоскопия
- оценка проходимости маточных труб
- гистероскопия
- диагностическая лапароскопия
- электрокардиография
- спермограмма расширенная
- анализ на степень фрагментации ДНК
- посткоитальный тест на совместимость супругов
- лабораторные анализы
Косметологические технологии:
- E-light эпиляция, лифтинги
- плацентная и липолитическая терапии
- уходовые программы для лица и тела
- программы коррекции лишнего веса
- лечение повышенного потоотделения (гипергидроза) и др.
Пластические операции:
- липосакция
- пластика молочных желез
- омолаживающие операции лица и пр.
Плазмаферез – оздоровительная процедура, которая применяется в клинике в целях профилактики различных заболеваний, и для повышения эффективности лечения, в том числе методами ВРТ.
В клинике ведут приёмы специалисты: репродуктологи, акушеры-гинекологи, уролог-андролог, пластический хирург, онколог-маммолог. Проводят консультации эмбриолог, анестезиолог.

thread.title_full: 겨울의 시작점, 입동(立冬)의 유래와 풍습을 알아보자 : 네이버 블로그

posts.author: 유안타증권
posts.title: 겨울의 시작점, 입동(立冬)의 유래와 풍습을 알아보자
posts.text:
[유쾌한 라이프] 겨울의 시작점, 입동(立冬)의 유래와 풍습을 알아보자 1시간 전 URL 복사 본문 기타 기능 번역보기 http://blog.naver.com/tysmyasset/221134652029
본격적인 겨울의 시작 ‘ 입동 ’
그 유래와 풍습 에 대해 알아보자 !
이불 밖은 위험해! 라는 말이 있죠? 아마 다들 한번 쯤은 들어보셨을텐데요! 이제 본격적으로 그 말이 와닿는 겨울이 다가오고 있다는 사실 T^T 게다가 길거리에서는 따끈따끈한 어묵과 붕어빵이 솔솔 나오고 있기 때문에 더욱 더 실감이 나는 것 같아요~!
오늘은 본격적으로 겨울의 시작을 알리고 겨울 준비를 시작해야 하는 입동 (立冬)의 유래와 풍습을 알아보려고 하는데요! 한자로는 설 ‘립 (立)’ , 겨울 ‘동 (冬)’ 으로 절기상 겨울의 시작점이 되는 날을 의미합니다. 가을이 시작된 지 엊그제 같은데 벌써 겨울을 알리는 입동이라니…! 정말 시간 빠르게 지나가는 것 같네요! 자, 이제 본격적으로 입동의 유래와 풍습에 대해 알아보도록 하겠습니다!
24절기 중 열아홉 번재 절기. 이날부터 겨울이 시작된다고 하여 이를 입동이라고 하는데요! 양력으로는 11월 7일 또는 8일 무렵, 음력으로는 10월에 듭니다. 옛 선조들은 농사를 지으며 생활을 해왔는데요! 기후 변화는 한 해 농사의 수확량을 알 수 있는 지표로 민감해질 수밖에 없었다고 해요. 그래서 풍요로운 한해 농사를 기원하는 고사를 지냈다고 합니다 :)
입동 무렵, 농가에서는 냉해를 줄이기 위하여 땅에 구덩이를 파고 수확한 무를 저장했다고 하는데요! 또한 추수를 하면서 들판에 놓아 두었던 볏짚들을 모아 소의 먹이도 준비했다는 사실! 여기서 한가지 더 알려드리자면 겨울철에는 모든 풀들이 말라 소의 먹이가 굉장히 부족하였는데 이때 주로 볏짚을 활용하여 쇠죽을 쑤어 먹였다고 합니다 .
① 김장 겨울을 준비하면서 가장 먼저 하는 것은? 바로 식량준비 즉, 음식입니다! 겨울을 대표하는 음식 중 가장 대표 음식은 김치라고 할 수 있는데요! 가장 대표적인 입동의 풍습 또한 김장이라는 사실! 김치를 담그는 풍습은 고려 시대부터 시작 된 것으로 알려져 있는 가운데 그때 농사를 지은 각종 채소들로 김장을 담가 독에 넣어 두면 한겨울 음식은 걱정할 필요가 없었다고 합니다+_+
② 치계미 ‘ 치계미 ’ 라는 단어는 많은 분들이 굉장히 생소하게 느껴지실 것 같아요! 치계미는 예부터 전해오는 굉장히 아름다운 풍습인데요! 지금으로 치면 어르신들을 위한 ‘ 잔치 ’ 정도로 생각해주시면 될 것 같습니다. 사또의 밥상에 올릴 반찬값으로 받는 뇌물을 뜻하며 입동, 동지, 등 날에 어르신들을 모시고 음식을 준비하여 대접하는 것을 말합니다. 생활이 곤궁한 사람들은 미꾸라지를 잡아 추어타을 끓여 대접하기도 했다고 합니다 .
③ 시루떡 오늘날에도 고사를 지내면 꼭 올라가는 음식 중 한가지는 시루떡입니다. 시루떡을 올리는 풍습은 조선시대에도 마찬가지였는데요! 한 해를 감사하며 내년의 풍작을 기원하는 의미로 입동 고사에도 시루떡이 올랐다는 사실 :) 그 해에 추수한 햇곡식으로 만든 시루떡을 마을 사람들과 함께 나눠먹으며 액운을 막고 행운이 농가에 깃들기를 기원했다고 합니다.
④ 입동보기 (점치기) 입춘 때는 보리의 뿌리를 보고 점을 치는 풍속이 있었다면 입동 때는 보리의 잎을 보고 점을 치는 풍속이 있답니다. 이때 보리의 잎이 가위처럼 두 개가 나면 보리 풍년이 든다는 것 !
입동에는 농사점과 더불어 날씨 점을 치는 풍습이 있었는데요. 제주도에서는 입동 날 날씨가 따뜻하지 않으면 그 해는 바람이 심하게 분다고 하였고 전라도에서는 입동 날 날씨를 보아 겨울 추위를 가늠한다고 합니다 !
옛 선조들의 입동 풍습을 하나 하나 살펴보니, 겨울에 대비하는 지혜와 따뜻한 정을 한눈에 만나볼 수 있는 것 같아요^^ 사람들과 가족들과 맛있는 음식을 나눠먹으며 몸도 마음도 든든하게 입동을 보낸 것 같습니다! 입동이 점점 다가오는 가운데 몸 건강 조심하시고 올해 겨울도 잘 이겨내보자고요 +_+

posts.title: 11.10日重庆市妇幼保健院身高促进门诊为宝宝长高支招 点击报名_大渝网_腾讯网
posts.text: 身材矮小虽然并不致命，却影响矮小儿童的一生，成为不容忽视的社会问题。2007年上海的一项调查显示，90%的矮小儿童有自卑、抑郁等心理障碍，成年后不具备正常劳动能力，面临升学、就业、婚恋等方面的沉重压力。 2017年11月10日（本周五）下午一点重庆市妇幼保健院儿保科与你一起关注孩子身高义诊活动，期待你的加入。 报名电话：重庆市妇幼保健院：023-60354345，13594726651 72%的成年矮小人只有初中及以下学历 七个小矮人和白雪公主的幸福生活只能发生在童话故事里，在现实生活中，身材矮小带来的问题却太多太多。 全国矮小人联谊会副会长魏泽洋说，根据联谊会内部的调查结果，72%的成年矮小人只有初中及以下学历，68%的矮小人没有稳定工作，矮小人正常恋爱结婚不足15%，100%的矮小人遭受过就业歧视。在这些衡量生活质量的重要指标上，矮小人都大大低于正常人。 目前临床上一般用标准差法或百分位法来判断身材矮小，即儿童身高低于同年龄、同性别、同地区、同种族正常儿童身高的2个标准差或3个百分位，就可诊断为矮小症 社会需要家长密切关注孩子的生长状况，及时发现孩子生长缓慢的信号： ●儿童的生长速度3岁前小于7厘米/年 ●3岁到青春期小于5厘米/年 ●青春期小于6厘米/年 到了青春期后，骨骼发育成熟，骨骺线闭合，身高就不再生长了，再用任何方法也无法使孩子继续长高。由于错过了给孩子治疗的最佳时机，很多家长只能遗憾终身。 值得注意的是，如果孩子生长速率高于正常值，也应警惕性早熟问题。 由于社会竞争越来越激烈，许多偏矮的的孩子为了长得更高也在积极干预治疗。 （儿童身高促进包括2种方法、3个等级、6个方面） 人的一生中体格发育分为三个阶段 1、婴幼儿期：3岁以内（生长快速期），出生时身高约为50厘米，到3周岁时身高约为96厘米，这阶段是我们一生当中身高生长的最快阶段，身高生长约46厘米，约占一生中身高生长的38%。 2、儿童期：3岁至青春期（生长速度减缓期），此期间生长主要由生长激素调节，生长速度相对比较平稳，每年约生长5-7厘米，身高共生长约55厘米，约占一生中身高生长的44%。 3、青春期：女孩约10—16岁，男孩12—18岁（生长加速期）由于有性激素的参与，在增高的同时骨成熟也加快，最终导致骨骺的闭合，身高停止生长，此期身高共生长约25厘米，约占一生中身高生长的18%。 从上面3点可以看出，人的一生当婴幼儿期很关键，特别是2岁以内生长发育障碍主要要从营养方面考虑，2岁以上生长发育障碍主要要从生长激素缺乏方面考虑；儿童期是我们一生中身高生长最大的一部分，约占44%，所以也是身高干预的黄金阶段，特别是3-6岁的儿童，此期如果是矮小患儿越早干预效果越好、费用越少、生长的潜能也越多；青春期前二年生长速度比较快，过了二年后，身高基本上长得很慢，此期身高共生长约25厘米，约占一生当中身高生长的18%，加上青春期在性激素的作用下骨骺容易闭合，身高容易停止生长，此期如果矮小患儿干预效果很差、治疗费用也非常昂贵。 身高促进门诊配备了先进的骨龄评估与成年身高预测系统及个体化身高促进干预方案，根据个体化的体格发育评估，成年身高预测等综合评估结果，由专家团队给家长及儿童提供营养、睡眠、运动、情绪、疾病预防等全方位、个体化指导，并为影响身高增长的各种疾病诊治，帮助宝宝们科学增高，达到理想的效果。 2017年11月10日（本周五）下午一点重庆市妇幼保健院儿保科与你一起关注孩子身高义诊活动，期待你的加入。 报名电话：重庆市妇幼保健院：023-60354345，13594726651 正文已结束，您可以按alt+4进行评论

thread.title: GIF Pornografi di WhatsApp, Kementerian PPPA: Orang Tua Harus Mengawasi
thread.title_full: GIF Pornografi di WhatsApp, Kementerian PPPA: Orang Tua Harus Mengawasi

posts.title: GIF Pornografi di WhatsApp, Kementerian PPPA: Orang Tua Harus Mengawasi
posts.text:
Kala Polisi Menyamar Jadi Pembeli Film Porno 
"Orang tua harus bisa mengawasi anak dari penggunaan internet. Jangan sampai terkontaminasi dengan konten porno. Untuk di WA sendiri, kita sudah koordinasi dengan pihak Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi (Kominfo) untuk segera melakukan tindakan tegas pada aplikasi tersebut," ujar Rini saat ditemui di Tangerang, Selasa (7/11/2017). 
Rini menjelaskan, tak dapat dipungkiri lagi bahwa saat ini kondisi yang terjadi adalah anak lebih canggih dan paham teknologi ketimbang orang tuanya. Untuk itu, sebagai orang tua dituntut untuk dapat mengikuti perkembangan era zaman yang ada. 
Selain itu, lanjut dia, pihaknya sudah membuat Program Perlindungan Anak Terpadu Berbasis Masyarakat dimana tematik pornografi masuk kedalam salah satu poin yang akan dimasukkan. Agar masyarakat lebih paham, bagaiama caranya agar anak tidak terpapar konten pornografi dan bagaiaman orang tua mampu menyampaikannya kepada si anak sesuai usianya. "Disini, orang tua menjadi peran yang sangat penting," tegasnya. 
Sebagaimana diketahui, informasi konten berupa GIF bermuatan pornografi di WhatsApp didapatkan melalui pesan berantai yang tersebar di layanan aplikasi tersebut. Dalam pesan itu, para orang tua diminta untuk waspada kepada anak-anaknya ketika mengakses WhatsApp. 
Berdasarkan uji coba, ternyata pesan tersebut benar. Dengan mengetikkan kata kunci tertentu yang berbau pornografi di pencarian Gif, pengguna bisa mendapatkan beragam adegan porno meski dalam tayangan pendek. 
(fin)

thread.title: Google ve Salesforce’tan yeni stratejik ortaklık
thread.title_full: Google ve Salesforce’tan yeni stratejik ortaklık

posts.author: Seda Gezer Şahiner
posts.title: Google ve Salesforce’tan yeni stratejik ortaklık
posts.text:
Teknoloji devi Google ve online CRM servisi Salesforce , müşterileri arasında değer yaratmayı hedefleyen yeni bir stratejik ortaklık duyurdu.
Google’ın blogundan yayınladığı bilgilere göre, Salesforce daha akıllı ve daha fazla işbirliği deneyimi sağlamak için Google Cloud ve Google Analytics verilerinden yararlanabilecek. Buna ek olarak, Salesforce, verilerini Google’ın G Suite verimlilik hizmetiyle bütünleştirmek için çalışıyor, böylece ortak müşteriler, Gmail, Google E-Tablolar ve diğer ürünlerdeki Salesforce bilgilerine daha kolay erişebilecekler. 
Müşteriler ayrıca Salesforce’un satış ve pazarlama yazılımını, popüler analitik hizmetin ücretli versiyonu olan Google Analytics 360’a bağlayabilecekler. 

 
Uluslararası pazarda Google’ın altyapı hizmetlerinden faydalanacak olan Salesforce aslında Google’a yabancı değil. 2008 yılında iki şirket Salesforce’un Google Uygulamalar’a entegre edildiğine dair bir açıklama yapmıştı. Ancak bu süreçle birlikte Salesforce’un büyük teknoloji şirketlerinin itici gücünden yararlandığı partnerlikler şirketin küreselde hızlıca büyümesini sağladı.
Salesforce şu anda Amazon’un Web Servis altyapısını kullanıyor ve şirketin bu altyapıdan çıkmaya niyetinin olmadığı belirtiliyor. Salesforce Google ile yaptığı yeni stratejik ortaklığın ardından Amazon ile ilgili süreci nasıl yönetecek, hep birlikte göreceğiz.

thread.title: Schminken für Fotos, gerötete Haut - Make up & Banana Powder
thread.title_full: Schminken für Fotos, gerötete Haut - Make up & Banana Powder

posts.author: LoveT. (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Schminken für Fotos, gerötete Haut - Make up & Banana Powder
posts.text:
Den Teint so schminken, das er auf (Blog)Fotos schön aussieht - Mattieren & Korrigieren mit Banana Powder. Wie man rote Hautstellen schminken und kaschieren kann.  
Die Haut ebenmäßig und glatt erscheinen zu lassen, geht natürlich auch als Frau jenseits der 50. Augenschatten, erweiterte Äderchen, gerötete Wangen oder Rosacea können mit Make up wie Concealer, Foundation oder farbigen Puder kaschiert werden. Heute zeige ich das Banana Powder von Gosh. Es ist ein loses Puder das mit dem Pinsel aufgetragen werden kann.  

Für alle Frauen, die mit ihrem Teint zufrieden sind, ist das Schminken mit Concealer, Foundation und Puder meist zu aufwändig. Ich bin da ganz bei ihnen. Warum sollte man sich dieses große Make up auch antun, wenn man sich im Alltag und auf Fotos gefällt!
Meine Schmink Tutorials für Make up auf Fotos oder für schönen Teint im Alltag sind für all jene Frauen, die sich gerne schminken. Frauen die gerne einige Minuten dafür aufwenden möchten um ihren Teint noch gleichmäßiger oder auch samtiger wirken zu lassen. Schminken, Make up aufzutragen, ist immer auch ein wenig meditativ. Man ist da für einige Minuten ganz bei sich, denkt von einem Schritt zum nächsten und übt alles mit Achtsamkeit aus.
Außerdem sehen die meisten Schminksachen hübsch aus in ihren glitzernden Döschen oder eleganten Cases.
Hier ist der Link zu meinem heutigen Video. Banana Powder von Gosh  Prime´N Set Primer & Mattifying Setting Powder.

Mit Puder den Teint korrigieren, das Make up fixieren oder glänzende Stellen mattieren  
Puder verwende ich nicht tagtäglich und bei jedem Make up. Für das schnelle Make up habe ich eine Cream to Powder Foundation, die zaubert ohne Aufwand ein schönes Ergebnis. Wenn das Make up etwas mehr Zeit in Anspruch nehmen darf, greife ich gerne zu Puder. Am liebsten zu Korrektur-Puder in verschiedenen Farben. Es gibt sie in Grün, Lila, Rosé, Gelb und Blau oder aus mehreren Farben gemischt. Zur Zeit liegen die gelben Puder wieder voll im Trend, ganz viele Kosmetik Marken haben jetzt ein sogenanntes Banana Powder im Sortiment.  
Das Gosh Banana Powder gibt es in Österreich bei Bipa zu kaufen. Ob es Schmink Produkte von Gosh in Deutschland gibt, weiß ich leider nicht. Essence hatte kürzlich ein Banana Powder in einer LE, das mir persönlich aber zu wenig Gelb-Anteil hatte und W7 hat ebenfalls ein günstiges Banana Powder im Sortiment. Aus dem Bereich Naturkosmetik gibt es Korrektur Puder in 3 Farben für das Gesicht von Alverde. Es beinhaltet zartes Violett, Grün und Gelb. Mehrfarbige Gesichts-Puder gibt es in gepresster Form in der Drogerie auch noch von Catrice und Essence. Beide beinhalten ebenfalls Puder in Gelb, Grün und Lila.  
Ich selbst benutze farbiges Puder in loser Form oder gepresst, im Ergebnis macht es bei mir keinen Unterschied. 
Loses Puder trage ich immer mit einem weichen fluffigen Pinsel auf.  

Ohne Foundation - mit Foundation - mit Banana Powder 
Für Fotos die auf den Blog kommen, also alle Fotos von Outfits, schminke ich mich immer zumindest mit Concealer und Foundation. Komplett ohne Make up mache ich keine Outfit Fotos.
Im Urlaub kommt es allerdings schon vor das ich mich ohne Make up fotografieren lasse und die Bilder dann auch auf den Blog stelle. Ich bin also nicht abhängig von Make up. Klar, sonst würde ich mich nicht komplett ohne Schminke in Videos und Beauty Beiträgen zeigen.   Bei mir ist es wirklich mehr eine Leidenschaft für alles was mit schminken, Beauty und Kosmetik zu tun hat. Es interessiert mich einfach was man mit Contouring, Highlighter oder Lidschatten machen kann.  
In der nachfolgenden Fotocollage bin ich anfangs ohne Foundation, dann mit Foundation und zuletzt mit dem Banana Powder als Finish zu sehen. Ich möchte noch dazu erwähnen, das dieses letzte Foto kein fertiges Ergebnis eines Make up Looks von mir zeigt. Es ist lediglich die Vorbereitung auf das eigentliche Make up. Nach dem Banana Powder geht es weiter mit der Kontur, den Highlights, dem Rouge, den Augenbrauen, dem Augen Make up und tuschen der Wimpern.  
Mein Fazit zum Banana Powder von Gosh: Das Banana Powder von Gosh lässt sich mit dem Pinsel leicht verteilen und ist geruchsneutral. Die Puderdose ist außer mit dem Schraubdeckel auch innen nochmal zu öffnen und zu verschließen. Wenn man den durchsichtigen Deckel innen dreht, kommt auf einer Seite das Puder durch kleine Öffnungen heraus. Dadurch ist es auch in kleinen Mengen sauber zu entnehmen, also ohne eine Sauerei zu veranstalten. Es ist farblich ganz toll um den Teint auszugleichen und zu mattieren.


Welches Puder besser ist, loses Gesichtspuder oder gepresst und praktisch im Case verpackt 
Früher war es so, das loses Puder von der Textur meist feiner war. Das Ergebnis war dann nochmal samtiger. Mittlerweile sind die meisten der gepressten Puder aber auch sehr fein und von schöner Textur. Gerade Clinique hat ein tolles Puder in gepresster Form im Sortiment. Das Redness Solution Kompaktpuder. Dem Case liegt in einem extra Fach ein guter Pinsel bei. Das gelbe Puder von Clinique ist so gut, das ich es schon nachgekauft habe. Auf Reisen und für unterwegs, ist es praktisch wenn ein Puder gepresst ist. Loses Puder nehme ich nie irgendwo hin mit.  Und so würde ich sagen das es rein um die persönliche Vorliebe geht bei der Wahl, in welcher Form das Puder nun gekauft werden soll.  
Loses Puder hat immer ein wenig den Hauch von Luxus, während die kompakten Puder in ihren Cases eher "praktisch" rüberkommen. Wobei das silber-weiße Case des Compact Powders von Clinique schon wirklich chic ist. Vom Ergebnis her ist keines besser oder schlechter.
Es geht mehr darum, zu überlegen ob man das Schmink-Schätzchen in der Handtasche herumtragen möchte oder das Puder auf dem Schminktisch platziert werden soll. 

Gosh Banana Powder - Review und Beauty-Video  
Im Video zeige ich, wie immer in meinen Beauty-Videos, den Auftrag des Puders und den Vergleich von Vorher zu Nachher.  
Mein Fazit ist, das dieses Banana Powder von Gosh zu den guten Puder Produkten gehört, die auf dem Markt zu finden sind. Es kostet in Österreich um die 14€ für 7g
Ich habe mir das Banana Powder im Zuge einer -30% Rabatt Aktion auf Schminke gekauft.  
Fakt am Rande. Das Banana Powder von T. LeClerc gilt als das Beste das auf dem Markt ist. Quasi die Königin aller Puder Produkte. Das Banana Powder von T. LeClerc gibt es in loser Form oder gepresst. Es kostet zwischen 40 und 50€ für 10g in der gepressten Form. Manchmal ist es auch Online im Angebot und daher etwas günstiger. Es lohnt sich die Preise zu vergleichen!  
So, nach diesem Beauty Artikel denke ich glatt, ein Schminknerd zu sein. *lach   

Liebst, LoveT.

thread.title_full: Pencalonan Ridwan Kamil Timbulkan Polemik di Golkar Jawa Barat, Ini Penyebabnya!

posts.title: Pencalonan Ridwan Kamil Timbulkan Polemik di Golkar Jawa Barat, Ini Penyebabnya!
posts.text:
Pencalonan Ridwan Kamil Timbulkan Polemik di Golkar Jawa Barat, Ini Penyebabnya! Oris Riswan, Jurnalis · Selasa 07 November 2017, 16:19 WIB A A A 
BANDUNG - Para kader Partai Golkar di Jawa Barat mulai bereaksi atas keputusan DPP Partai Golkar yang mengusung Ridwan Kamil di Pilgub Jawa Barat 2018. 
Bertempat di salah satu rumah makan di Kota Bandung, Selasa (7/11/2017), para pengurus kecamatan (PK) Partai Golkar se-Jawa Barat berkumpul. Mereka menggelar konferensi pers. BERITA TERKAIT + Targetkan 10 Kemenangan di Pilkada Jabar 2018, PKS Ingin Lanjutkan Dominasi Kepemimpinan 
Para PK itu mewakili seluruh lebih dari 600 PK di Jawa Barat, kecuali Indramayu. Mereka tergabung dalam Forum Komunikasi Pengurus Kecamatan Partai Golkar Jawa Barat. Mereka menyatakan menolak keputusan DPP mengusung Ridwan Kamil-Daniel Muttaqien. 
Juru Bicara Forum Komunikasi Pengurus Kecamatan Partai Golkar Jawa Barat Yayan Heryana mengatakan dukungan PK se-Jawa Barat terhadap Dedi Mulyadi murni karena melihat sosoknya. Dedi dinilai punya kapasitas mumpuni untuk menjadi cagub. 
Itu alasannya kenapa Golkar dari tingkat bawah hingga DPD Partai Golkar Jawa Barat merekomendasikan Dedi Mulyadi sebagai cagub. Tapi, DPP justru mengusung calon lain yang membuat kader Golkar di Jawa Barat gerah. 
Sebab, Dedi Mulyadi didukung dengan mekanisme yang sudah benar. Sehingga, apa yang dilakukan DPP justru tidak sejalan dengan mekanisme yang ada. 
Para kader Golkar dari berbagai PK itu pun akan bersikap. Mereka akan mengadu soal keberatannya itu ke Mahkamah Partai Golkar. 
"Kami akan menuntut ke Mahmakah Partai. Kami akan berangkat ke sana (dalam waktu dekat)," kata Yayan. 
Menurutnya, akar rumput Golkar di Jawa Barat marah dengan keputusan DPP. Kemarahan itu pun sulit dibendung. Sehingga, para kader akan ke Mahkamah Partai Golkar untuk menyuarakan penentangan terhadap keputusan DPP. 
"Kami di grassroot marah besar, kami tidak mengizinkan baju kami sedikit demi sedikit luntur. Kami tidak mengizinkan itu (DPP mengusung Ridwan Kamil)," tegasnya. 
Ia mengaku bingung apa yang dijadikan dasar oleh DPP untuk mengusung Ridwan Kamil, termasuk merekomendasikan Daniel Muttaqien sebagai cawagubnya. 
Selain itu, parpol seharusnya menjaga marwahnya dengan mengusung kadernya sendiri. Tapi, yang terjadi Golkar justru mengusung orang lain yang bukan kader. 
Hal serupa dilakukan partai lain yang memilih mengusung non kader. Itu dinilai sebagai sebuah kegagalan bersama. 
"Muncul di publik parpol itu tidak dihormati, kalah oleh figur. Ini kegagalan seluruh parpol kalau semua parpo ngagugu (menuruti) ke si individu. Kalau parpol sepakat mengangkat derajat partai politik, ya parpol usung kadernya dong," tegasnya. 
Yan, perwakilan PK Malangbong (Garut), menyatakan dalam Rakerda beberapa waktu lalu di Karawang, hanya nama Dedi Mulyadi yang direkomendasikan menjadi cagub untuk disampaikan ke DPP. 
"Yang dikritisi, waktu Rakerda itu yang diusulkan Dedi Mulyadi, tidak ada nama Ridwa Kamil. Tapi tiba-tiba (SK) yang turun Ridwan Kamil. Ini yang sangat kita pertanyakan, apa artinya? Sudah jelas mekanismenya waktu itu (ditempuh dengan benar)," tandas Yan. 
(muf)

Уточняется, что закроют съезды на Садовое кольцо у Большого Дровяного переулка и на Таганскую площадь перед тоннелем. 
На Таганской площади изменится схема движения транспорта, сообщает агентство новостей "Москва" . 
Уточняется, что закроют съезды на Садовое кольцо у Большого Дровяного переулка и на Таганскую площадь перед тоннелем. 
Данные меры помогут устранить потенциально опасные участки, а также снизить задержки в движении.

thread.title: 30 Days of Christmas, Day 24 Bendi Fold
thread.title_full: 30 Days of Christmas, Day 24 Bendi Fold

posts.author: Beth Norman (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: 30 Days of Christmas, Day 24 Bendi Fold
posts.text:
Hello fellow stampers and friends.  Are you following Technique Junkies 30 Days of Christmas ?
I thought it would be fun to make a Bendi fold card for you.  I started by stamping out Santa Moonlight several times with my Misti.  When the image was good and dark I masked off my moon and created Northern Lights for the sky.

In the forefront I used Bunny Girl which I fussy cut, and then added a funky tree.

The 30 days runs from October 15th to November 13th.  During this time all Christmas stamps are 20% off, and if you use my code TJ10 Beth , you get an extra 10% off–making your savings 30% off. 

I curved the front of my card and added Stampn’ Up DP with snowflakes.
Hope this puts you in the Christmas mood.

thread.title: GA IRINTA NAN
thread.title_full: GA IRINTA NAN

posts.author: yabibabba7
posts.title: GA IRINTA NAN
posts.text:
GA IRINTA NAN 
MALLAKA…….YBK…….20
Addu’ar juriya da neman nasara akan abun da ke damunka/ki.
Our Lord, pour upon us patience and plant firmly our feet and give us victory over the disbelieving people.
Rabbana afrigh ‘alayna sabran wa thabbit aqdamana wansurna ‘alal-qawmil-kafirin.
Asama’u ta tsaya kallon qofar bayan fitar Fatima, ta yi wani irin murmushi cikin jin dad’in samun nasarar abun da ta aikata, ta riga ta fahimci Fatima ba zata iya jure ganinta kusa da Isma’il ba, shi ya sa da ta ji motsinta ta rungume shi. Fahimtar ta na gab da rasa abun da ya kawota gidan in har ta biye ma zuciyarta ta yi fushi kamar yadda ta yi datsu da ta baro su falo, yasa ta yanke shawarar sake salon takun saqarta.
Isma’il ya kalle ta ya ce “Ina Shehu?” Ya ci nasarar rabata daga jikinshi a lokacin.
“Na ya d’aki ya na wasa.” Ta bashi amsa cikin sauri ganin ya d’an sakar mata fuska.
“To ki je wajensa, zamu je Charanci mu gaido Hajiya, da zaki shirya da mun tafi tare na maida ki can kafin in warware matsalar da ke tsakaninmu.”
Ta gurgiza kanta “Ba wata matsala a tsakaninmu Sama’ila sai fa in kaso ka maida ta matsalar, koda ba aure a tsakaninmu a yau in kaso ana iya daura shi na amince ko da kuwa a kan bashin sadaki ne. Ku je ku dawo ina nan.” Ta koma kan gado ta zauna.
Ya bud’e inda kayanshi suke ya d’auko riga da wando na wani yadi mai kyau ruwan qasa ya sanya. Kallonshi take ba ko kyaftawa duk motsin da ya yi kan idonta. Tana ji chan qasan zuciyarta wani garwashin qaunar Isma’il na ruruwa.
Ya kalleta ta yi murmushi ta ce “Ka yi kyau.”
Ya d’anyi murmushin yaqe ganin yadda ta kura mashi na mujiya, har ya ji ya takura.
“Gidannan ba nawa ba ne, ki kula da zamanki gidannan ko da baki tafi ba yanzu, ya dace ki san sadda zaki rinqa shigowa d’akina in har hakan ta kama.” Ya fad’a ya na tuna kalamanta cewa suna tare a tsawon shekarunnan da ya yi na jarabawar rayuwarsa.
“Zan kiyaye, Allah kuma ya tsare hanya.” Ta bashi amsa yayinda ya bud’e qofar ya fita.
‘Ke kuma Fatima ki shirya ma wata jarabawar, yanzu za ki san kinyi babban kuskure a yunqurinki na raba ni da Sama’ila. Yanzu zaki san manene kishi.’ Ta fad’a a ranta fuskarta cike da fara’a.

Fatima ta wuce d’akin mahaifiyarta cikin shirinta ta ce “Zamu je d’aukar yara da Isma’il.” Ta fad’a daga bakin qofar d’akin.
“To Allah Ya taimaka, sai kun dawo.” Fad’ar Haj Rabi.
Har ta juya zata fita idonta ya kai ga na Hadiza da duk ta wani marairaice. Ta juya zata fita ta ji muryar Hadiza ta ce “Dan Allah ki ba Isma’il haquri, wallahi ban ji dad’in abun da na yi ba.”
“Baki da mugun hali Hadiza sai wannan, baki.” Fatima ta kama bakinta ta na nuna ma Hadiza.
“Kullun shawarar da Mama ke baki kenan, duk abun da zai fito bakinki ki yi nazarinsa kafin ki furta shi, don in ya fito ba zai koma ba. Kuma qani illarsa ta har abada ce. Gashinan tun ba’a je ko’ina ba kin ji kunya, amma baki bani haushi ba don dama halin mutanen yanzu ne, ka yi shekara da shekaru kana kyautata masu, a yini d’aya sun manta, amma in da wata dabba ka kyautata mawa na yini d’aya sai ayi shekaru bata manta ba, misali, ranar da naga magen (kuliya) gidannan a waje cikin sanyi na daukota na bata abinci da masauki, daga ranar duk inda ta ganni kamar taga mahaifiyarta dan murnar da take, a zahiri zaki fahimci hakan, ba’a qara wata biyarba ta dawo nan gidan da zama gabad’aya da zuri’ar ‘ya’yanta duka. Shekaru kusan bakwai kenan, kusan shekarun su Maryam da Mariya. Don haka kar ki damu, ko baki nuna mun halarci ba, magunan gidannan sun isheni.” Ta qarasa maganar idonta cijin na Hadiza.
Dakyer Hadiza ta had’e yawun bakinta, cikinta ya yi wata qara kamar ta gudawa, ta san magana ce yayarta ta gaya mata. Ko da wasa bata ta’ba tada mata zancen ‘yarta ba tun ranar da sukayi maganar a karon farko na kuma qarshe a shekarun baya. Take baqincikinta na rashin gano inda ‘yarta ta ke ya koma sabo gareta. Gashi cikin shekarunnan sama da baqwai da aurensu ko ‘batan wata bata tab’a yi ba. Sai bautar ‘yayan mijinta kawai take ba dare ba rana, randa kuma duk ta kuskure suka yi kuka da ita ranar kamar zai yanka ta don masifa. Tabbas ta san Allah ne ke jarabtarta ya hana ta haihuwa har yanzu. Hannunta ya kai kan cikinta ta shafe shi.
Ta meqe ta sha mur kamar da gaske ta kalli mahaifiyarsu ta maida kallonta ga Fatima ta ce “Halarcin me ki ke so in yi maki kuma, duk wanda na yi ma ki a baya bai ishe ki ba. Kar ki manta a baya tun daga kayan sawa, kayan shafa da abinci basu yanke maki, tunda in na aje ma Mama na d’auka ta baki. Shi kanshi Isma….” Ta kasa qarasa wannan maganar ganin ba wasa sam a idon Fatima.
“Sannan yanzu ko wannan gidan marayun da ki ke taqamar kina kula da su, duk rabin gudumuwar da ki ke samu ba Honorable ke aiko maki da su ba.”
“Kai Allah Ya kyauta, Hadiza hankalinki raggaggene. Wuce ku tafi Fati kar ya yi ta jiranki.” Fad’ar Hah Rabi.
Fatima ta girgiza kanta ta yi murmushi ta ce “In baki manta ba dai na gaya maki zaki mutu da baqincikin kuskurenki. To sai mun dawo Mama.” Ta juya ta fice.
Haka ta barta nan tsaye kamar zata yi kuka don takaici.
Hadiza ta sab’i jakarta cikin bacin rai ta ce “Mama na tafi.”
“To nima aje ni gidan Haj Maijidda.” Haj Rabi ta d’auki gilashinta ta manna a ido sannan ta zuri hijabinta ta miqe.
Isma’il na jingine da bango daidai bakin qofa da ga waje ya na jiran fitowar Fatima. Koda ta fito ta miqa mashi makullin mota ta yi murmushi tare da yin d’an fari da idonta. Ta ce “Mu je.”
Kallonta ya yi cikin shakku, amma murmushinta ya qara mashi qwarin gwuiwa don haka ya qarasa wajen motar cikin kuzari.
Fatima ta ce “Ina zuwa.” Ganin kanshi ba hula ya sa ta koma d’akin shi da sauri ta ‘dauko hula “matching” d’in kayan jikinshi, idonta ya kai ga Asama’u qwance kan gado. Ta baje abunta tana taunar cingam, sai wani littafin yara a hannunta tana kallon hotuna. Shehu da ke gefenta kallo d’aya ya yi mata ya d’auke kanshi daga dubanta, shima ya fara kallon hohunan da mamanshi ke kallo, amma Fatima ta fahimci tsoron da ta hango a idanuwansa.
Ko kallon inda Fatima take Asama’u bata yi ba har ta bar d’akin. Fatima bata san tana da kishi ba sai ‘yan qwanakinnan da Asama’u ta yi dasu. Amma dole ne ta san yadda zata yi takun saqarta, tabbas kishi gaskiya ne, sai dai zata yi koyi da kishin su Nana Aisha (R.A). Ba kishin zamani ba na hauka. Ta yi addu’ar neman nasara da haquri sannan ta fice.
Suna fata tafiya Fatima ta kalleshi ta ce “Ka zauna da matarka Isma’il ka kuma kyautata tsakaninmu, ko don d’anta kamar yadda Mama ta ce. Na san ba macen da zata qwace mani matsayi a zuciyar abun qaunata.”
Ya kama hannunta ya riqe yana wasa da shi, ya yi murmushi ya ce “Tabbas matsayinki daban ya ke a wajena Fatina, amma sai na yi nazarinta tukunna sannan zan san in zata iya kasancewa a cikin rayuwarmu.”
Yaran gabad’aya sun ji da’din canjin da suka gani a mahaifinsu. Koda suka aje su gida ba su sauka mota ba su ka wuce Charanci bayan sun tsaya sunyi ma Haj Indo sayayyar y’an kayan abinci a hanya a karo na biyu kenan tun bayan da Fatima ta d’auki Isma’il.
Jameela ce ta dafa masu “indomie” su ka ci ganin gidan ba kowa sai Antinsu Asama’u da Shehu.
Ba jimawa malamin da ke ma Jameel da Jameela “lessons” ya zo. Dan haka suka wuce yar rumfar da suke karatun daga can tsakar gida. Su kuma su Maryam da Mariya da Shehu na wasansu cikin gida.
‘Danjuma ne ya shigo ya ba Asama’u wayarsa ya ce ga Audu nan ya na son yayi magana da ita.
Ta koma daga cikin gidan ta kara wayar a kunne ta na fa’din “Alo…”
“Ke wai daga qwana biyu har yanzu shiru, ko kin manta abun da ya kaiki gidanne?”
“Ai ka san sai a hankali sannan haqarmu zata cimma ruwa, dole in d’an qwana biyu kafin su saki jiki dani. Kuma baka san abun da ya faru ba, Sama’ila fa ya warke, kuma da alama zai amince da ni a matsayin matarsa, ni kam zan so in zauna da mijina sai mu warware wancan kullin da muke shirinyi.”
“Lallai ba ki da hankali, ki ka ce Sama’ila ya me…?”
“Wallahi da gaske ya warke.” Ta fad’a.
A daidai lokacin motar Fayima da Isma’il ke tuqawa ta wuce ta gabanshi badon sun lura da shi ba. Ya bi motar da kallo cikin mamaki da tsoro baki sake.
“Qaiqayi kan iya komawa kan masheqiya.” Maganar Mai Allon Qarfe ta fad’o mashi a rai gabanshi ya shiga dukan tara tara.
“Alo.., alo ko ka kashe ne?” Asama’u ta tambaya daga ‘dayan bangaren.
Ya dafe qeya ya ce “Na gansu yanzu sun wuce ta gabana shima ke tuqa motar, na yarda da maganarki ya warke, amma in har hakanne, to kuwa ki hanzarta yin abun da ya kai ki gidannan don in dai har Sama’ilan da na sani ne to ba fa zai zauna da ke ba. Don ba ki cikin ajinsa. Sai dai in zaki juri wulaqanci.”
“A’a a’a, ai wallahi ka san ni kam ba ni ‘daukar wulaqanci wall….”
“To maza ki yi abun da ya kowo ki, sai na ganki.” Ya kashe wayar ya yi gida da sauri don tabbatar ma kanshi abun da idonshi ya gani.
YBK………

thread.title: Woidke ruft zum 9. November zu Engagement für Freiheit auf - Berlin - Aktuelle Nachrichten
thread.title_full: Woidke ruft zum 9. November zu Engagement für Freiheit auf - Berlin - Aktuelle Nachrichten - Berliner Morgenpost

posts.author: Morgenpost.de
posts.title: Woidke ruft zum 9. November zu Engagement für Freiheit auf - Berlin - Aktuelle Nachrichten
posts.text:
0 0 Potsdam.  Brandenburgs Ministerpräsident Dietmar Woidke (SPD) hat anlässlich des historischen Datums 9. November dazu gemahnt, Freiheit und Demokratie zu verteidigen und sich gegen Rechts einzusetzen. "Ein lebenswertes und demokratisches Deutschland gibt es nur, wenn die Grundwerte geschützt werden", sagte Woidke am Dienstag in Potsdam. Dafür stünden Bürgergesellschaft und Staat in der Verantwortung. Rechtspopulisten würden immer häufiger versuchen, Freiheit und Demokratie in Frage zu stellen und Ressentiments gegen Minderheiten für politischen Machtgewinn zu instrumentalisieren. 
Der 9. November ist für Deutschland in mehrfacher Hinsicht ein historisch bedeutsames Datum: 1918 rief Philipp Scheidemann (SPD) an dem Tag die deutsche Republik aus. 1938 zerstörten die Nazis in einer Pogromnacht zahlreiche Synagogen und Läden von Juden. Viele Juden wurden verschleppt und ermordet. 1989 schließlich fiel an dem Tag die Berliner Mauer.
Woidke legt an diesem Donnerstag zum Gedenken an den Mauerfall einen Kranz an der Glienicker Brücke zwischen Berlin und Potsdam nieder. In Cottbus, Frankfurt (Oder) und der Landeshauptstadt wird am selben Tag der jüdischen Opfer des Nazi-Pogroms gedacht. Am Freitag erinnert Innenminister Karl-Heinz Schröter (SPD) an der Glienicker Brücke an die Grenzöffnung, die dort erst einen Tag später erfolgte.
( dpa )

thread.title: HLAVÁČ: Zajišťovací show versus fakta. Zajišťovacích příkazů výrazně ubylo
thread.title_full: HLAVÁČ: Zajišťovací show versus fakta. Zajišťovacích příkazů výrazně ubylo

posts.title: HLAVÁČ: Zajišťovací show versus fakta. Zajišťovacích příkazů výrazně ubylo
posts.text:
4 Diskuse Autoři pořadu Zvláštní vyšetřování zbytečně naháněli A. Babiše místo toho, aby... | foto: Facebook, Andrej Babiš Moje osobní vztahy s finanční správou nebyly v minulosti vždy úplně idylické, a nikdy bych se nenadál, že budu psát článek na její obhajobu. Téma zajišťovacích příkazů k tomu však vybízí. V předvolebním období se stalo velkým mediálním tématem, jak zajišťovací příkazy ničí jinak údajně naprosto zdravé firmy a jak jsou zneužívány pro konkurenční boj. 
Likvidačních účinků zajišťovacích příkazů si všimla –náhodou před volbami – anonymní Skupina Šuman, i když byly už roky používané finanční správou, ale také orgány činnými v trestním řízení a v určité podobě i exekutory. Jako demonstrace toho, jak se zajišťovacími příkazy ničí prosperující firmy, jak příkazy slouží k dalšímu bohatnutí Agrofertu a na kolik to přijde státní rozpočet, byly použity případy firem FAU a KM PLUS. 
Kauze KM PLUS se věnoval kanál Zvláštní vyšetřování , který na Streamu provozují reportéři Sabina Slonková a Jiří Kubík. V posledních třech dílech, uveřejněných jen hodiny před začátkem voleb, natočili na téma KM PLUS doslova reality show. Přitom se důsledně vyhýbali uveřejnění jakéhokoliv důkazu, čísla nebo dokumentu v čitelné podobě. Vláda si pozve Janečka a Schillerovou. Vysvětlí údajné zneužití zajišťovacích příkazů 
Příběh se začíná v polorozpadlé budově, kde se údajně měly nalézat výrobní prostory. Následně novináři navštíví pracovníka finanční správy, který na několikrát opakovanou otázku proč byly příkazy vydány, odpovídá, že to je v nich podrobně popsáno a odkazuje na mluvčí. Příběh pokračuje vstupem volebního lídra ČSSD Lubomíra Zaorálka, který ochotně přikyvuje na návodné otázky. Hon na Babiše 
Následuje nejzábavnější část celé show, kdy Slonková s Kubíkem honí Andreje Babiše po restauracích a náměstích během volebního mítinku. A ještě přichází epizoda „agenta Agrofertu“, který je kýmsi snad informován o chystaných zajišťovacích příkazech a lstivě prodává svoji dlouho splatnou a zjevně už nedobytnou pohledávku za KM PLUS další osobě. 
Možností, že by důvodem vydání zajišťovacího příkazu mohla být kritická finanční situace firmy KM PLUS, situace, která byla v okruhu jejích obchodních partnerů notoricky známá, se reportáž nezabývá. Série vrcholí tradičním výstupem utajeného svědka, který řekne, že po Babišově příchodu na ministerstvo bylo špatně úplně všechno a nejhorší je daňová náměstkyně Schillerová, která chce stále vybírat nějaké daně. Utajený svědek říká, že je dlouholetým pracovníkem ministerstva financí. Náš utajený svědek tvrdí ale o jeho identitě něco úplně jiného. 
Tolik mediální reality show. A teď pár skutečných a ověřitelných faktů. Otázky pro příště 
Prostor, který je k dispozici, neumožňuje zachytit všechny detaily. Kdo však chce mít skutečně spolehlivé informace a nechce se nechat krmit jen emocemi, měl by nahlédnout do insolvenčního rejstříku, kde vše o KM PLUS bez problémů najde. Škoda, že tuhle práci si zřejmě nedali autoři reportáží. 
Pokud by točili nějaké další, mohli by si položit třeba následující otázky: 
1. Proč se tak vehementně sháněli po vysvětlení důvodů zajišťovacích příkazů z úst úředníků, když vše je podrobně vysvětleno přímo v tomto příkazu, který byl KM PLUS prokazatelně předán? 
2. Jak je možné, že majitel provozoval svůj podnik léta s prakticky nulovou marží, a tedy bez zisku, a přitom získal dotaci ministerstva průmyslu a obchodu? 
3. Jak je možné, že cena technologie, kterou za dotaci nakoupil, se v řetězci spřátelených firem navýšila z původních 8,7 milionu na 32 milionů? Nebylo to náhodou proto, že dotace činila 16,4 milionu a pokrýt může právě nanejvýš 50 % ceny? Jak to bylo s nadměrnými odpočty DPH? 
4. Kde se vzalo 18 milionů korun, o které vzrostl kapitál firmy v roce 2014? Je to náhoda, že to je prakticky stejná suma, jakou činí rozdíl mezi už zmíněnou cenou obvyklou a cenou, která byla za technologii skutečně zaplacena, snížený o korporátní daň nutnou k vyprání peněz z řetězových obchodů? 
5. K insolvenčnímu řízení přistoupil státní zástupce a některé dokumenty nasvědčují tomu, že probíhá či se připravuje trestní řízení. Byl už někdo obviněn? 
6. Před vydáním zajišťovacích příkazů byla firma ve zpoždění s hrazením přibližně 20 procent závazků. Nebyly už tehdy splněny podmínky pro vyhlášení insolvence? 
7. Proč majitel provozoval svůj podnik bez schválení výroby nebezpečných látek v budově, která nebyla pro daný účel zkolaudována a byla zjevně ve špatném technickém stavu? 
8. Po vydání zajišťovacích příkazů došlo k odcizení účetní a další dokumentace v písemné i digitální podobě. Taková smutná věc se firmám v insolvenci stává často. Proč neexistovala záloha dat? 
Sečteno: pokud někdo prezentuje KM PLUS jako prosperující firmu, trochu mě děsí, jak asi vypadají ty neprosperující. Jak je to doopravdy s počtem zajišťovacích příkazů? 
Podobných otázek by mohlo být ještě daleko víc. Je s podivem, že autoři reportáže vůbec neútočí na soud, který už žalobu na údajně neoprávněně vydané zajišťovací příkazy pravomocně odmítl. Asi se to nedostalo do scénáře, honba na Babiše byla vizuálně zajímavější. 
Pro úplnost je třeba poznamenat, že insolvenční správce přihlášky finanční správy v rámci insolvenčního řízení popřel, což je ovšem naprosto běžná praxe. Rozhodne o nich insolvenční soud a nezdá se, že by to mělo dlouho trvat. 
A nakonec několik souhrnných informací o tom, jak byly zajišťovací příkazy používány v době před Babišem a v jeho éře. V posledním roce úřadování ministra Kalouska, tedy v roce 2013, byly vystaveny zajišťovací příkazy na částku 6,1 miliardy korun. V prvním Babišově roce, tedy 2014, to bylo 4,1 miliardy, v roce 2015 3,6 miliardy, v roce 2016 3,2 miliardy av první polovině roku 2017 1,1 miliardy. 
Co rostlo, byla efektivita zajišťovacích příkazů, tedy poměr mezi zajištěnou a vydobytou částkou. Stalo se to proto, že v roce 2012 došlo ke změně zákona o DPH, kterou připravil dnešní Generální ředitel Finanční správy Martin Janeček. Novinka spočívala v tom, že zajišťovací příkazy jsou účinné ihned, nikoli až za čtyři dny, kdy už zpravidla není co zajišťovat. Pan Janeček za to dostal od tehdejšího ministra Miroslava Kalouska odměnu 20 tisíc korun a stát začal ročně vybírat několik set milionů korun navíc. Na úspěšných žalobách proti zajišťovacím příkazům musel zaplatit jen asi 355 tisíc korun. Slušné skóre, které se logicky někomu nelíbí a přál by si vrátit staré časy, kdy se na ministerstvu financí jistiny i úroky z daňových dluhů velkoryse promíjely. 
Pokud tedy někdo tvrdí, že za Babiše používání zajišťovacích instrumentů eskalovalo, prokazatelně lže. 
A protože každý čin dobrý pro státní rozpočet musí být po zásluze potrestán, navrhuje pan ministr Zaorálek odvolání ředitele Janečka… Tomáš Hlaváč, Lidové noviny

thread.title_full: USGS TOPO Map Illinois IL Marion 308105 1966 24000 Inverted

posts.author: wetdryvac
posts.title: USGS TOPO Map Illinois IL Marion 308105 1966 24000 Inverted
posts.text:
Artist's Description 
The Vac loves old maps. 
Starting with Maine, this project uses USGS historical topographical maps in the public domain from USGS.gov and applies the following processes: 
1) The maps are converted from the USGS formatting of geo-PDF to standard graphic format.2) During conversion the sRGB colorspace is applied.3) The maps are cropped where necessary to remove areas of scan/photograph that didn’t include the map itself, namely scanner deck and similar.4) Where applicable the colors are edited – usually in cases of severe yellowing – to improve readability while keeping as much evidence of wear and tear as possible.5) In some few cases, the maps are further edited to remove uneven edges and scanner deck colors. This occurs where an edge of a map has been folded under or there’s a curve deformation in the scan. This is not done in cases where the map has a physical hole. 
For each map, an inversion is also created. Thus, each map has a positive and negative version.If you’re looking at a traditional map, you can find the color inversion of that map by searching the name of the map plus the word inversion. If you’re looking at an inverted color map, the traditional map can be found by searching for the name of the map without the word inversion. 
After the title, the first number is typcially catalog related, the second is typically the year, and the third is typically the scale. 
USGS maps are in the public domain, and this map is courtesy of the USGS. 
All edits, color corrections, and digital work beyond the initial archival scan are done by the Vac of wetdryvac.net. 
For Maine alone, there were 4064 maps in the historical archives. As such, this project is going to take a while. If you would like to have a specific map converted for print, visit wetdryvac.net and contact the Vac from there. Let them know what town, state, scale, and other things you would like prioritized. 
The Vac also does custom map modifications. If you’d like custom text or layout added to a map to reflect a game character, a personal location of importance, “Here there be dragons and kittens,” Or similar, the Vac is happy to make that go for you as well for a price. The price for the edits is in addition to the price you pay for the print here – the Vac prefers to use Red Bubble even in cases of direct sale. 
-Wetdryvac / Wetdryvac.net Posters Tags usgs topo map illinois il marion 308105 1966 24000 inverted wetdryvac net wetdryvac public domain source united states geological survey maps mapping topographic topographical orienteering All Products Tags

thread.title: Enchanted Plants: Blossom Hydrating Facial Mist
thread.title_full: Enchanted Plants: Blossom Hydrating Facial Mist

posts.author: Beauty Balm (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Enchanted Plants: Blossom Hydrating Facial Mist
posts.text:
I randomly came across the beautiful  Enchanted Plants  on Instagram and had to buy their  Blossom Hydrating Facial Mist  (£27 - 100ml) which just shouted out to me that I must buy! 




Founder, Jemma a Medical Herbalist has loved plants since she was small. Her mother and grandfather were passionate gardeners. She's also got a degree in Health Science & Medicinal Plants with specialism in treating skin conditions. 
I absolutely loved the email I received upon ordering which made me smile "when you buy something from a small maker a real person does a little dance of joy!" 
The skincare is truly beautiful - artisan, certified organic and handmade with love, care and attention to detail. There is a real live shop too at 6 The Commons in Shaftesbury, Dorset.  Where possible Jemma uses homegrown British ingredients including Lavender & Chamomile oils, British grown Oats among others. They donate monthly to Plantlife to support their work in protecting and preserving British wild plants and their habitats for future generations. 
Blossom Hydrating Facial Mist  is simply exquisite. It smells of "garden flowers after the rain", a beautiful uplifting floral mist with Orange Flowers, Rose Geranium, Chamomile waters with Vitamin rich Cucumber extract, spring water and skin plumping Hyaluronic acid. Spritz the skin to refresh, tone and uplift your mood. 
The mist is handmade surrounded by clear quartz crystal for added rejuvenation and potency. 100% natural origin, 19% organic. 
I absolutely love it. It's the perfect treat for both the skin and senses. 
Jemma very kindly sent me two sample pots -  Rosehip Repairing Nightly Facial Oil * which is one of the nicest facial oils I've ever used! A concentrated night time elixir which deeply nourishes and rejuvenates the skin while you sleep. 
Rosehip repairs, Argan softens with nutrient rich Pomegranate & Blackcurrant seed oils. Frankincense and Helichrysum oils repair and rejuvenate while organic English Lavender and blue Yarrow calm and soothe. The facial oil is made surrounded by Amethyst crystal for added potency, calmness and serenity. Massage a few drops onto cleansed skin nightly (when my stash reduces a bit this one will be mine!) 100% natural origin, 99% organic. 
The second sample is the gorgeous  Lavender Eucalyptus Cleansing Balm *  which honestly smells good enough to eat! Pure unrefined cocoa butter easily removes daily grime and stubborn waterproof mascara! Virgin coconut softens while olive oil comforts. Antiseptic Eucalyptus oil and soothing English Lavender ensure the skin is left feeling clean, balanced and comfortable.  Massage onto the face and neck and remove with a warmed damp muslin cloth. 100% natural origin, 99% organic. 
I can't quite believe how good these products are. I've loved using them and at some point will buy the   Complete Skincare Collection . The range are among my favourite products of 2017. Have you used any products from Enchanted Plants? If so, what are your favourites? 
*complimentary samples

thread.title: EM JOAQUIM NABUCO, PE - DOIS MELIANTES FORAM BALEADOS DURANTE TROCA DE TIROS COM A PM
thread.title_full: EM JOAQUIM NABUCO, PE - DOIS MELIANTES FORAM BALEADOS DURANTE TROCA DE TIROS COM A PM

posts.author: augusto cesar (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: EM JOAQUIM NABUCO, PE - DOIS MELIANTES FORAM BALEADOS DURANTE TROCA DE TIROS COM A PM
posts.text:
Uma troca de tiros entre policiais militares e assaltantes terminou com os dois bandidos feridos em Joaquim Nabuco, na Mata Sul do estado. O tiroteio aconteceu na noite do último domingo (05/11), nas proximidades do engenho Cuiambuca, na zona rural. 
A PM foi informada que dois meliantes estavam assaltando moradores em diferentes lugares do município, utilizando-se de uma motocicleta preta, e seguiu em diligência para interceptá-los. Em poucos instantes, os policiais localizaram os elementos, que já haviam roubado diversos aparelhos celulares e iniciaram uma intensa perseguição. 
A corrida durou até a estrada de acesso ao engenho, quando os elementos saltaram da moto e começaram a atirar contra a viatura. Os militares então revidaram os disparos, atingindo os dois indivíduos. Imobilizados, os dois foram imediatamente socorridos ao hospital de Joaquim Nabuco. 
Em virtude da gravidade dos ferimentos, um dos elementos foi transferido para o Hospital Regional do Agreste, em Caruaru, mas não há informações de seu atual quadro de saúde. 
MATERIAL APREENDIDO 
Além da arma utilizada nos assaltos, um revólver calibre 38 (com duas munições intactas, duas deflagradas e uma pinada) e a motocicleta da fuga, a PM apreendeu 11 (onze) aparelhos celulares subtraídos das vítimas. Todo o material apreendido foi conduzido à delegacia e anexado ao inquérito. 
Nova Mais.

thread.title: Guardian Unraveled (Fallen Guardian, book 3) by Georgia Lyn Hunter
thread.title_full: Guardian Unraveled (Fallen Guardian, book 3) by Georgia Lyn Hunter

posts.author: Kriss Neidy (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Guardian Unraveled (Fallen Guardian, book 3) by Georgia Lyn Hunter
posts.text:
GUARDIAN UNRAVELED Fallen Guardians, book 3 
by Georgia Lyn Hunter 
Genre:  Paranormal Romance 


From the scorching pits of Tartarus, a warrior emerges with a deadly need for more than vengeance… 

A loner, Dagan, lives with an inexorable thirst he’s kept hidden for eons, even from his fellow Guardians. Until he meets a beautiful, maddening human who awakens in him a hunger that shakes him to his very core, and threatens to shatter his tightly erected shields, exposing his dangerous secret. And wanting her is a path leading to destruction.

Driven to find her missing mother in a shadowy world, Shae Ion refuses to be sidetracked. When she becomes the target for a sinister force, a sinfully sexy and utterly impossible immortal abducts her, and he’ll stop at nothing to keep her safe.

Stuck in an isolated place with the reclusive Guardian who allows no one close, Shae struggles to control her new burgeoning powers, and is unprepared for the tangled emotions he stirs in her. But passion has a way of obliterating barriers.

However, the road to happiness is strewn with treachery. When an old enemy strikes, and comes after Shae, they are drawn into a terrifying, supernatural battle. And not even Dagan, a lethal, immortal warrior who’d lay down his life for her, can save her now…


Shae inhaled deeply, counted to ten, and prayed a madman hadn’t abducted her.

He remained hunkered down in front of her, eyes cool, his powerful forearms braced on his muscular, leather-clad thighs. Small scars marred his tanned fingers he kept loosely clasped in front of him. He wore a wide, corded leather band on one thick wrist and several narrow ones on his other. His black t-shirt stretched across his broad shoulders like a second skin, the short sleeves revealing bulging biceps. On his left one, he sported a sword-like tattoo made up of a myriad of intricate designs. It was unusual, like nothing she’d ever seen.

With those clothes and his long, ropey hair, he dressed like an extra from a movie shoot or something.

“You can’t keep me here,” she tried to reason with him. “You have to let me go. My uncle will be frantic and calling the cops by now.”

“Not until you answer my questions. Those dead men?”

She scowled, all thoughts of being calm and rational flying out the window. He’d accosted her outside the club, kidnapped her, and now he expected her to answer his damn questions? “Just what the hell are you talking about? What dead men?”

Sure, he was infuriatingly good-looking, but then so was Ted Bundy.

At the thought of the serial killer who’d charmed and murdered several college girls, Shae sprang to her feet and bulleted for the door. He grabbed her around the waist. Crap, she’d forgotten how fast he could move.

“Lemme go!” She hit him, but he merely swept her into his arms like she was some delicate freakin’ daisy and carried her back. Furious, she bit him. Hard. And hoped her teeth did some real damage to his biceps.

An annoyed grunt escaped him. “Stop that, you little hellcat.”

Like a bag of unwanted grain, he dropped her on her butt, back on the mat again.

Pain jarred up her spine, and she clenched her teeth. But the three angry, red streaks scored on his powerful forearm had her blinking.

She’d done that? Shocked to her core at her dreadful behavior, Shae opened her mouth to apologize but when she met those burning yellow eyes that had taken on hints of orange, a spurt of anger cut through her guilt. “This is kidnapping. I’m gonna have your barbaric ass thrown in jail!”

“Try. When you’re ready to talk, scream. Maybe I’ll hear you, maybe I won’t.” His eyes like flint, he stalked out, shutting the door quietly behind him, only to stride back inside. He crossed to the far end of the room, grabbed all the swords from the stand there, and walked out again. Leaving behind a small fridge. Right then, she wanted to fling the appliance at his arrogant head. Except he looked like he could break her neck with just one hand.

She had to get out of here before he came back.




Amazon ✯ B&N ✯ iTunes ✯ Kobo ✯ Smashwords ✯ Goodreads 


Absolute Surrender 
Born in the flames of Heaven’s wrath, he’s all things sinful and too dangerous to love. 

An immortal Guardian of the human race, Aethan has walked alone for millennia, trapped in a hell of his own. Until a feisty mortal crosses his path. A female he shouldn’t even look at, one who shakes the precarious foundations of all that he is, and one who’s determined to walk the edge of danger.

All her life, Echo Carter wanted “normal”, an impossible feat given that she can see demons. Drawn back to the alleys of New York, she’s determined to hunt down the one responsible for the death of her friend. And no man, no matter how sexy, will stop her. Until she discovers a horrifying truth about herself, forcing her to turn to the one man she should avoid. Aethan.

But when two stubborn wills collide, a dangerous passion ignites…

As evil closes in, Aethan has to overcome his darkest fears and claim Echo as his. If he doesn't, he just could lose her to a far more sinister fate…

*This is a re-edited version with an added epilogue.

Breaking Fate 
An immortal without a soul is bad enough. But when his only tether to remaining honorable is his addiction to bone-crushing pain, it makes Blaéz a dangerously loose cannon. 

A Guardian sworn to protect mortals from supernatural evil, Blaéz straddles the edge of darkness as his needs grow. When a good deed brings him to the doorstep of a female unlike any other, one whose touch ignites emotions long lost in the hellish pits of Tartarus, he’s determined not to lose her. She belongs to him. But she’s human. Forbidden. And bringing her into his life may just destroy them both.

Darci Callahan has given up on love. But when a lethally handsome stranger suddenly appears late one night, she finds herself inexplicably drawn to the captivating man with the pale, empty eyes—a man who awakens in her a desire she never believed possible. Except Blaéz brings more than unexpected passion to her life, he brings danger.

In this treacherous new world of gods and demons, Darci soon discovers a heart-shattering truth and the twisted games the gods play. Caught in the crosshairs, she’s forced to accept that, sometimes, no matter how much you love someone, you have to love them enough to let them go…



I’ve been creating stories from the moment I could string two words together. No matter the tale, it always has romance woven through them. Yes, I'm a hopeless romantic.

When I’m not writing or plotting new books, I like to read, travel, painting, or troll flea markets where I usually buy things I might never actually use because they're so pretty.

After working in a few jobs all art related, a chosen career as a fashion designer, then an art teacher, I finally found my passion four years ago: writing. There really is no other job I’d rather do.

Oh, and I live in the beautiful country of South Africa.

thread.title_full: Андрей Бочкарев: завершены бетонные работы по устройству двух эстакад основного хода СВХ от Щелковского до Открытого шоссе

posts.title: Андрей Бочкарев: завершены бетонные работы по устройству двух эстакад основного хода СВХ от Щелковского до Открытого шоссе
posts.text:
Первая эстакада основного хода в направлении Щелковского шоссе возводится на участке от 5-го Проезда Подбельского до ТПУ МЦК «Локомотив». 
Вторая эстакада основного хода в направлении Открытого шоссе возводится на участке от ТПУ МЦК «Локомотив» до северной границы участка ФГКУ «Комбинат Сигнал». Кроме этого, завершены работы по устройству двух подпорных стен, обратной засыпке и устройству дорожной одежды. Эстакады обеспечат движение автотранспорта по 3-4 полосам движения в каждом направлении. 
Также на эстакаде съезда с Щелковского шоссе при движении из области на внешнюю сторону хорды в направлении Открытого шоссе выполнены все бетонные работы, завершено устройство гидроизоляции, устройство защитного слоя и уложен нижний слой асфальтобетонного покрытия. Производятся работы по устройству деформационного шва. 
Напомним, проектом предусмотрено строительство 5,495 километра дорог, в том числе 3,397 километра эстакад. 
«Ранее мэр Москвы Сергей Семенович Собянин отмечал, что строительство участка Северо-восточной хорды от Щелковского до Открытого шоссе позволит перераспределить транспортные потоки между Щелковским шоссе и Открытым шоссе, снизить транспортную нагрузку в восточном секторе города на улицы Большая Черкизовская, Стромынка, Краснобогатырская, Русаковская набережную», - добавил . 
В соответствие с госконтрактом, полностью работы на участке хорды должны быть завершены в IV кв. 2018 год. Москва <

thread.title: Российский миллиардер тайно зарегистрировал самолет в США
thread.title_full: Российский миллиардер тайно зарегистрировал самолет в США

posts.author: Рамблер
posts.title: Российский миллиардер тайно зарегистрировал самолет в США
posts.text:
Журналисты уличили российского миллиардера, крупного акционера попавшей под санкции США компании «Новатэк» Леонида Михельсона в тайной регистрации бизнес-джета в Штатах. Об этом пишет The New York Times со ссылкой на отчет Международного консорциума журналистских расследований (ICIJ) под названием Paradise Papers («Райские бумаги»). 
Как утверждает NYT, Михельсон стал клиентом американского Bank of Utah, и финансовая организация якобы выступила для него в качестве «дублера», позволив «тайно зарегистрировать частный самолет в Соединенных Штатах, что требует американского гражданства или проживания». Издание отмечает, что это — «часть деятельности Bank of Utah, которая позволяет богатым иностранцам юридически получать американские регистрации для своих самолетов». Банк, по данным газеты, делает это «через доверительные счета, от своего имени». 
NYT поясняет, что регистрация в США повышает стоимость самолета, если владелец планирует затем его продать, а также упрощает бюрократические процедуры. Кроме того, это может позволить избежать уплаты некоторых налогов. 
ICIJ опубликовала свой отчет «Райские бумаги» 5 ноября. Документ появился благодаря утечке 13,4 миллиона документов с Каймановых островов и Бермуд. В отчете говорится об офшорах, связанных с политиками и бизнесменами со всего мира. Последние новости

thread.title: Walter mira estreia pelo Timão em 2017: 'Disposição, vontade e raça'
thread.title_full: Walter mira estreia pelo Timão em 2017: 'Disposição, vontade e raça'

posts.author: LANCE!
posts.title: Walter mira estreia pelo Timão em 2017: 'Disposição, vontade e raça'
posts.text:
07/11/2017 06h40 São Paulo (SP) 
Walter sabe o que precisa fazer em sua estreia pelo Corinthians em 2017, nesta quarta-feira, contra o Atlético-PR, na Arena da Baixada. O goleiro quer encarar com naturalidade o duelo na Arena da Baixada e mostrar disposição, vontade e raça.Ele será o substituto de Cássio, que está com a Seleção Brasileira para amistosos na Europa e desfalcará o Timão em pelo menos dois jogos, contra Atlético-PR e Avaí. Há ainda a possibilidade de o titular perder o confronto com o Fluminense, porque retornará ao Brasil horas antes.- A gente tem que encarar como se fosse uma final, jogo a jogo como tem sido desde o início do ano. Comigo não será diferente. Tenho que entrar, fazer bem o meu papel, ajudar a equipe de qualquer forma para a gente conseguir o resultado positivo e se aproximar ainda mais do título. É o que a gente almeja. Tenho de encarar com naturalidade, muita disposição, vontade e raça, como o torcedor gosta. Sempre que precisa, a gente tenta fazer o melhor - afirmou Walter.- Sempre trabalho o ano inteiro esperando por uma oportunidade. A gente gosta do que faz, está feliz em uma grande equipe. Minha dedicação sempre foi a mesma, não preciso mudar, não tem sido nada diferente. Muda no jogo a concentração para a partida, isso dá uma mudada, mas no dia a dia o trabalho é o mesmo - acrescentou.Após terminar 2016 como titular, Walter não atuou nesta temporada porque sofreu uma lesão goleiro ainda não atuou em 2017 porque sofreu um edema ósseo no quarto arco costal no início do ano. Com isso, ele foi desfalque na pré-temporada e também no único jogo que Cássio foi poupado, contra o Linense, na primeira fase do Paulistão.Mesmo sem ter entrado em campo, Walter acredita que contribui para a campanha do Timão nesta temporada. Ele contou como tenta aconselhar os jogadores durante as partidas e elogiou o clima no elenco.- A gente tenta contribuir no banco de reservas, nos treinamentos, no intervalo dos jogos. Converso bastante, passo dicas. A gente fala no geral, pega uns pontos ou algum jogador, vai lá e dá uma dica, porque sabe o que o jogador já fez e o que pode render. A gente procura dar esses "feedbacks". Não só eu, mas também o Fellipe Bastos, o Danilo. E é legal porque todos respeitam o que a gente está falando, vão lá e fazem em campo. Você pega uns times aí que um fala, o outro fala, o outro resmunga. O que está sendo legal é esse clima que o Corinthians criou, essa família que foi criada e estamos colhendo ótimos frutos - disse Walter.- Gosto de falar bastante, lá do banco eu consigo falar mais com os laterais e pontas. No jogo não é diferente. Sempre gostei de chamar a atenção, orientar, não xingar, esbravejar, mas sempre ajudar e orientar e dar uma força - completou. E MAIS:
